newsitem.title: JAPAN: Moody's upgrades Nanto Bank's debt ratings.
newsitem.headline: Moody's upgrades Nanto Bank's debt ratings.

text.p: Moody's Investors Service said on Thursday that it had upgraded its short- and long-term deposit ratings for Nanto Bank to Prime-2 and Baa1 respectively, from Prime-3 and Baa2.
It said it had also raised the bank's Bank Financial Strength Rating (BFSR) to D from E+.
